metadata.title: CVE-2024-40991 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: ti: k3-udma-glue: Fix of_k3_udma_glue_parse_chn_by_id()The of_k3_udma_glue_parse_chn_by_id() helper function erroneouslyinvokes "of_node_put()" on the "udmax_np" device-node passed to it,without having incremented its reference count at any point. Fix it.
